resources.string: Check that your Home\u00A0Assistant is powered on and you\'re connected to the same network. You can enter the address manually if you know it.
Allows you to access your Home\u00A0Assistant server on the go. It runs locally in your home via a device like the Home\u00A0Assistant\u00A0Green or Raspberry\u00A0Pi.
How would you like to name this device?
This is used to identify your device in your Home\u00A0Assistant.
Local by default.\nRemote when youâ€™re ready.

Your Home\u00A0Assistant is only accessible on your home network. To control your smart home from anywhere, you can set up remote access later in your settings.\nFor now, you\'re securely connected to your local network.
Do you want to share your location?
